bill.summary:
Stretching Entity Resources for Vulnerable Communities Act or the SERV Communities Act
This bill makes a series of changes to the 340B drug pricing program (i.e., a program that allows entities to receive covered outpatient drugs at reduced prices from manufacturers), including alterations relating to program integrity, discrimination against participating entities, and program eligibility.
